reviewText:
I feel cheated. The Cd and Dvd Are the Exact Same Program. It is a 17 minute program that starts out telling us why we should give to help others and to spread the Gospel. He also says why he has a great need for our money.  I'm sure his heart is in the right place, but I could have heard this on tv and save my badly needed money.
  I thought this was going to be a teaching that would help me in my walk with the Lord, so I thought it was worth the investment; but I was wrong.  I will stick to watching him on tv when I can.
